- Topic: Street Name Change for Robert E. Lee Boulevard
- Summary: The City Planning Commission recommended renaming the entirety of Robert E. Lee Boulevard as Allen Toussaint Boulevard, with modified approval. This change would affect all addresses on Robert E. Lee Blvd. from Peoples Avenue to Lakeshore Drive/West End Blvd.
- Ordinance Number: SNC 4-21
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Passed - (7 YEAS, 0 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 0 ABSENT)
    Vote 2: Passed - (7 YEAS, 0 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 0 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The ordinance to rename Robert E. Lee Boulevard to Allen Toussaint Boulevard received modified approval from the City Planning Commission and was added to the agenda for further consideration.
- Tags/Keywords: City Planning Commission, Street Name Change, Robert E. Lee Boulevard, Allen Toussaint Boulevard

- Topic: Appeal of Historic District Landmarks Commission's Decision
- Summary: The council considered a request to appeal the decision of the Historic District Landmarks Commission to deny the demolition of the property located at 4419 Willow Street. A motion overruling the decision of the Commission and approving the demolition was passed.

- Topic: Appeal of Historic District Landmarks Commission's Decision
- Summary: The council also considered a motion to uphold the decision of the Historic District Landmarks Commission and deny the applicant's request for demolition of the property located at 4419 Willow Street. This motion was withdrawn.

- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Withdrawn
